verse.name: v1
verse.lines: From every stormy wind that blows, newline From every swelling tide of woes, newline There is a calm, a sure retreat: newline 'Tis found beneath the mercy seat.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There is a place where Jesus sheds newline The oil of gladness on our heads, newline A place than all beside more sweet: newline It is the Blood-bought mercy seat.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There is a scene where spirits blend, newline Where friend holds fellowship with friend. newline Though sundered far by faith they meet newline Around the common mercy seat.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Ah whither could we flee for aid, newline When tempted desolate dismayed, newline Or how the hosts of hell defeat, newline Had suff'ring saints no mercy seat.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Ah there on eagle wings we soar, newline And sin an sense molest no more; newline And heav'n comes down our souls to greet, newline While glory crowns the mercy seat.
